mapper.select: select kpiKindName, unitCode, unitName, bpDivisionGroupId, bpDivisionGroupName, bpOrgRegionId, bpOrgRegionName, kpiId, kpiName, timeUnitDD, timeUnitYear, timeUnitPrdNum, sortOrder, kpiNorm, inKpiCount, totalCount, kpiRatioAvg, kpi2RatioAvg, prevKpiRatioAvg, prevKpi2RatioAvg from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId}, p_DimCode => #{systemUnitCode}, p_KPIKindID => #{kpiKindId}, p_BPDivisionGroupIDs => #{directionIds}, p_BushIDs => #{regionIds}, p_DUODRFlag => #{doudrFlag}, p_KPIIDs => #{kpiId} ))

select kpiKindName, unitCode, unitName, bpDivisionGroupId, bpDivisionGroupName, bpOrgRegionId, bpOrgRegionName, kpiId, kpiName, timeUnitDD, timeUnitYear, timeUnitPrdNum, sortOrder, kpiNorm, inKpiCount, totalCount, kpiRatioAvg, kpi2RatioAvg, prevKpiRatioAvg, prevKpi2RatioAvg from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId}, p_DimCode => #{systemUnitCode}, p_KPIKindID => #{kpiKindId}, p_BPDivisionGroupIDs => #{directionIds}, p_BushIDs => #{regionIds}, p_DUODRFlag => #{doudrFlag}, p_KPIIDs => #{kpiId} ))

select kpiKindName, unitCode, unitName, bpDivisionGroupId, bpDivisionGroupName, bpOrgRegionId, bpOrgRegionName, kpiId, kpiName, timeUnitDD, timeUnitYear, timeUnitPrdNum, sortOrder, kpiNorm, inKpiCount, totalCount, kpiRatioAvg, kpi2RatioAvg, prevKpiRatioAvg, prevKpi2RatioAvg, description from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_DimCode => #{systemUnitCode}, p_KPIKindID => #{kpiKindId}, p_BPDivisionGroupIDs => #{directionIds}, p_BushIDs => #{regionIds}, p_DUODRFlag => #{doudrFlag}, p_KPIIDs => #{kpiId}, p_DetailMode => #{detailsMode} ))

select valueday, period, typeperiod, numperiod, directorate, nametype, codekpi, namekpi , regions, regioncenter, direction, summary, successfully, factkpi, goatkpi, executekpi, descript, duodr_flag from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_summaryKpiOb())

select valueday, period, typeperiod, numperiod, directorate, nametype, codekpi, namekpi , regions, regioncenter, direction, summary, successfully, factkpi, goatkpi, executekpi, descript, duodr_flag from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_summaryKpiOb_filter( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_KPIKindID => #{kpiKindId}, p_BPDivisionGroupIDs => #{directionIds}, p_BushIDs => #{regionIds} ))

select division_name ,user_name ,oper1 ,goodtime24 ,goodtime24p ,goodtime48 ,goodtime48p ,dop from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_DssEmployees( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}
)) order by 1

select division_name, loanappl_ref, user_name, slaoperationsrc_name, slaoperationsrc_no, operation_start_time, operation_end_time, di, time2 from table(pkg_kpiob_api.get_Dss( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate} ))
